headline: MMM Q1 Earnings Call: Revenue Exceeds Expectations Amid Tariff Uncertainty and Operating Improvements
summary: Industrial conglomerate 3M (NYSE:MMM) reported Q1 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, but sales fell by 1% year on year to $5.95 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.88 per share was 6.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
